text: The New Hands is an upcoming horror film. The film stars Stephen Wu, Sally Kirkland, Felissa Rose and Lexi Graboski. It is written and directed by Brandon Scullion based on his 2017 short of the same name. It is produced by Pat Kusnadi and John R. Blythe under Blythe's production company, Film Regions International. Principal photography finished in February 2018. ==References== Category:English-language films Category:Upcoming films
title: The New Hands
